content: Electrobeach音乐节（通常简称EMF）是在法国巴卡雷斯港的一个公园举行的年度电子舞蹈音乐节。最新阵容包括Afrojack, Tara McDonald, Dirty South, Hardwell, Sebastian Ingrosso和Armin Van Buuren。2014年分为两个舞台可容纳观众。 2013年，两天内有56，000人。2014年，两天内有80，000人，分两个舞台，可容纳40，000人。
contentEn:
Electrobeach Music Festival (often abbreviated as EMF) is an annual electronic dance music festival held at a park in Port-Barcarès, France. Recent lineups include Afrojack, Tara McDonald, Dirty South, Hardwell, Sebastian Ingrosso and Armin Van Buuren.[1] In 2014 there were two stages and a capacity of people.[2] 2013 saw 56,000 people over two days. 2014 saw 80,000 people over two days, there were two stages and a capacity of 40,000 people

 

References

  1. ^ http://djmag.com/content/david-guetta-added-electrobeach-line
  2. ^ http://www.digitalspy.com/music/review/a584274/wanna-party-in-france-electrobeach-is-one-of-the-best-places-to-start.html#~p7Rqi7MQt85zKg
  3. ^ Jump up to:a b Teckyo.com, EMF 2013 – 19&20 JULY 2013 : Electrobeach Music Festival
remarks:

sponsor: Joëlle Ferrand, Office de Tourisme Port-Barcarès
